relevant_findings.neurological_examination: Patient was alert and oriented with fluent speech; unable to copy intersecting pentagons, draw a clock face or daisies; difficulty dressing; mild dysarthria; incongruous left hemianopia; mild pronator drift of the left arm; mild weakness of left wrist and finger extension; dysmetria of left arm on finger-to-nose testing. The remainder of the cranial-nerve examination was normal.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular_examination: Normal, no carotid or orbital bruits noted, peripheral pulses intact.
